1.name: Tackle
1.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

2.name: Growl
2.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

3.name: Ember
3.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

4.name: Water Gun
4.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

5.name: Vine Whip
5.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

6.name: Thunderbolt
6.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also paralyze the target.

7.name: Ice Beam
7.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

8.name: Psychic
8.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

9.name: Shadow Ball
9.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

10.name: Dragon Claw
10.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

11.name: Dark Pulse
11.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

12.name: Moonblast
12.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
